However, our  money for charitable causes came from the small business.

lenders.occupational_info: I feel empowered and enjoy my work as co-creator of sustainabilty in our society.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I can. I think this is a wonderful way to help someone who is less fortunate. To give someone a chance to be able to provide for themself in a very dignified way.

lenders.name: Lori
lenders.loan_because: I love the idea of a hand up instead of a hand out. I know that given a chance, people can do amazing things with a little bit of support. I'd like to try to help provide support to others who are less fortunate than I am.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a travel agent specialized in airlines and plane tickets. I manage a small group of airline specialists who do all the ticketing for a chain of travel agencies. We issue tickets to almost every country in the world and I'd love to visit every one of them!

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because:
I loan without profit to follow Christ in generosity.

I earn money on Prosper.com, and I will be putting 10% of the profit into Kiva.  Kiva is a superior donation for the developing world over subsidies or bulk food donations because these other methods often harm the target economy.  Kiva solves this problem by providing capital where there is not enough to recipients who have incentive to profit.

lenders.name: Leatitia
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to contribute in financial independency and some degree of well being of others and I hope soon to do more.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: it honors all who have helped me.
lenders.occupational_info: Computerized record keeping.

lenders.name: joffrey
lenders.loan_because: I know we can not change the world, but we can change the world for some people.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family of three living in the Netherlands. My wife works for an administration office, my son is eleven years old. My occupation is Continental Europe Maintenance Coördinator for a large well test company in the oil and gas industry. We hope we can contribute in a better world...

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed with a fantastic life
lenders.occupational_info: I work in management at an advertising agency -- helping clients drive their business through advertising and other marketing activities

lenders.name: Tabitha
lenders.loan_because: It's an easy way to help people create a better life for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I instruct diving and skiing around the world.

lenders.name: Jacqueline
lenders.loan_because: it's a better way to spend my money than on that latest mobile phone that I don't really need. Also, as the loans are being paid back, I can keep spending the same money over and over again, making someone happy each time.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: It is way to help others who are less fortunate than me.
lenders.occupational_info: Emeritus Professor

lenders.name: Graham
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to have some spare funds to help others
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing, PR and financial management

lenders.name: George & Marie
lenders.loan_because: we do a lot of travelling and feel this is a great way to help the hard working people of the world.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: When I was down and out some friends helped me out. Now it's my chance to help someone else who needs help

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: A lot of smaller steps will make a giant leap for mankind!
lenders.occupational_info: I translate feelings and thoughts between animals and their caretakers.

lenders.name: Jan-Wouter
lenders.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship and self-employment are excellent ways to improve a person's financial situation, and I lend because a loan adds an incentive in its own right.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company works in the field of cultural tourism.

lenders.name: Jethro
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to help people get out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am doing research into innovative computer technologies which I also implement into working software.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: "Humankind" we are both!
lenders.occupational_info: Compassionate care for others.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I can help make the world a better place than I found it.
lenders.occupational_info: I give people personal financial advice to help them provide for their familes.

lenders.name: Clement
lenders.loan_because: It is important that all people can do what they want., and be happy with the result. So they inspire others to do the same, life is to short, and if we can help others, why not!

lenders.name: Benthe
lenders.loan_because: I saw the Oprah show today with kiva in it and I loved it immediately!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student

lenders.name: Liesbeth
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people to get started and help themselves and their families.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an internet company that generates leads for various kinds of business. I work as an accountmanager inside sales. My job is to enroll companies in our Lead Generation program and match leads with our customers.

lenders.name: Alexis Rondeau
lenders.loan_because: I think that it makes a lot of sense. Realizing that an amount that might be small for me can make a big difference for someone else renders it well spent.
lenders.occupational_info: My goal is to connect the real world with information from the internet and make it accessible right there, right now to anyone.

lenders.name: Jeremy & Kylene
lenders.loan_because: like Mahatma Gandhi, we want to "be the change you want to see in the world"
lenders.occupational_info: we care deeply about social justices issues both locally and globally

lenders.name: Arpad
lenders.occupational_info: I'm working for an informatical retailer where I have to manage the stock and the logistic.

lenders.name: Ruth
lenders.loan_because: what I want for myself I want for everyone, and EVERYONE deserves a better life.
lenders.occupational_info: I do house chores, clean, do laundry, ironing, vaccuming, etc., go out to bring and  pick-up   my kids to and from school.

lenders.name: Camryn
lenders.loan_because: When I was starting out, I remember so many small favors that I received from people.  Those favors added up and ultimately got me where I am today. Their support and generosity helped me follow my dreams and become a successful business woman. It gives me such great satisfaction to do the same for people all over the world.  I love that I am actually able to sit at home with my son and see the faces and read the stories of the people we help, cheering them on every step of the way and sharing in their success.  My parents taught me the importance of giving back to the world, and Kiva is a wonderful way to pass that lesson along to my son.
lenders.occupational_info: I guess I would describe what I do as storytelling.  My hope is that through my work as an actress, I can unite people by holding a mirror up to humanity.  There are thousands of ways to make a social contribution in this world.  As an artist, I strive to illuminate the struggles, the triumphs and the sorrows of the world in hopes of provoking people to make positive changes.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: It is my responsibility.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach history and world geography.

lenders.name: Kent

lenders.name: Astrid
lenders.loan_because: This is a great way to help someone.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children with special needs.

lenders.name: John & Connie
lenders.loan_because: God is great!  Share the love.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to love all mankind.

lenders.name: Jack
lenders.loan_because: it helps people who need money
lenders.occupational_info: i think it is very  fun to do extra chores around the house for mone it makes me feel good to help  people in need of money

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: A savings|investment as preferable aid: Independent borrowers earn the dignity and lasting self-confidence associated with responsible loan repayment. Institutional managers are more careful to ensure borrower success and generally perform better when there are risks involved.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers, reporting the daily progress of a large company.

lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell their homes. I'm also a policy buff and write.

lenders.loan_because: I feel its a great way to make a big difference with small means.

lenders.name: Steve

lenders.occupational_info: "You make a living by what you get...you make a life by what you give."

I see so many people here with good ideas and creativity to create opportunities for themselves and the people around them. The only thing they need to forfill their plans is money.

Money is not spread equally. For $ 25,- I can buy food for only a few days, but in other parts of the world this money is worth a lot more!

It's the idea that a relatively little investment form my side can make a lot of difference for somebody else.

What I like is: after the money is payed back it can be invested again in another great idea.
lenders.occupational_info:
As a  copywriter I create texts for advertisements, promotional brochures or other public relations outlets such as websites.

Besides that I play guitar and djembe (percussion)

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: Because I can.
lenders.occupational_info: Retail manager

lenders.name: Marianne
lenders.loan_because: Lending money to people to enable them to realise their dreams is much more satisfactory than placing it on a savings account!

lenders.name: Tri2Give
lenders.loan_because: We are preparing to race in our very first Ironman triathlon. After a long day of training we always feel so incredibly blessed to be able to participate in a sport that we love. So, it only makes sense to want to help those not as fortunate find their way to a better life.

lenders.name: The Pink Squirrels
lenders.loan_because: We are  concerned with the rights and opportunities of women in our community and throughout the world. We believe we can improve the lives of others, even if we've never met.
lenders.occupational_info: Our organization is a small group of young women that raises money for specific causes. We host community events to bring people together and try to create fun happenings in our town.

lenders.name: inge
lenders.loan_because: I want to help other woman in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: i ame a houswive and i haf a little handicap so i cant work  bad der is my dog i walk with her se is my vriend.

lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to make a better world!
lenders.occupational_info: Photographer

lenders.name: Fam. Stou
lenders.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world" - Gandhi

lenders.name: Elles
lenders.loan_because: It's important helping to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a mother of two beautiful children, and I have my own business selling maternity clothes. I want to teach my children that's it's important to help others, even if you don't have that much.

lenders.name: Nanda
lenders.loan_because: This is a very direct way to help people, you see where your money goes

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: This is the best way I've ever found for helping others far away. I am so proud of Kiva and its founders, I can't even express it properly.

lenders.name: Leslia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others!

lenders.name: Emiliana
lenders.loan_because: how we treat one another matters.

lenders.name: Mary Anne
lenders.loan_because: I learned about kiva.org through PBS and also from the recent Oprah show with President Clinton and the founders of kiva.org.  What a fantastic, simple idea.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to run an international research group involved in sustainable development. We collaborate with people from around the world.

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because: It puts my money to good use.

lenders.name: John & Melinda
lenders.loan_because: We've been blessed and want to share with others. We really admire the creativity of these opportunities for us to provide a loan to hard-working people. It's exciting to see a loan repaid, which means the business is likely thriving.
lenders.occupational_info: John works for a company and manages the money that they bring in, making sure people are paying for the company's services. Melinda works for a web site to help make the site easy for people to use.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I want people to suceed in whatever they want accomplish in their lives

lenders.name: Jolien
lenders.loan_because: I care about people, who are less fortunate.

lenders.name: Jill & Erik
lenders.loan_because: We believe that nobody deserves to live in poverty.  By helping others build their business from the ground up we're actively helping, if even in a small way, to end global poverty.

lenders.name: Vince and Anna
lenders.loan_because: This is how we know what love is: Jesus Christ laid down his life for us. And we ought to lay down our lives for our brothers. If anyone has material possessions and sees his brother in need but has no pity on him, how can the love of God be in him? Dear children, let us not love with words or tongue but with actions and in truth. This then is how we know that we belong to the truth, and how we set our hearts at rest in his presence whenever our hearts condemn us. For God is greater than our hearts, and he knows everything.
